page.title: 17A day in Simon's life - 1
page.content: Today is Friday. I get up at eight o'clock, get dressed, and get my swimming things ready, then I go downstairs into the kitchen. I watch television until about half past eight then I have a bowl of cereal. When I finish my breakfast I go upstairs to have a wash, then go back downstairs to ask Dad to clean my shoes. I put my shoes on, put my jacket on and get my swimming things, then I go to the garage and get my bike, open the garage and ride to school. When I get to school I put my bike in the bike shed and walk round to the front door. When I get inside I hang my bag and jacket on my peg and go into the classroom, open my desk, get my pencil out and walk over to take the barometer reading. I write it down on the barometer chart, then Russell writes it down on the main chart.
